text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Dozing off, I see an old memory<n>dance through my dreams.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my way home from the<n>amusement park, I find a girl
crying<n>because she got separated from her<n>mom.
choice_data_list: Want me to help you look for her?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Really?! Thanks, big bro! Hehe,<n>you're so nice. ♪

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Really?! Thanks, big sis! Hehe,<n>you're so nice. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her tears dry as we search, and<n>then... as we pass the
park's princess<n>castle, she stops and looks up.
choice_data_list:
...Do you want to be a princess when you grow
up?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I follow the girl's gaze to the<n>castle, the question slips
out of my<n>mouth. In response, she turns around<n>and
flashes me a warm, mellow smile.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Well, my dream is—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's morning, and I arrive in front of<n>the Tracen Academy
school gates to<n>find a huge crowd of people outside<n>
waiting for something.

text_block_list.name: Trendy Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
No way—I think we managed to grab<n>the best spot here!
We're like super<n>close!

text_block_list.name: Fangirl Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Waking up early to claim a spot was<n>so worth it! And If I'm
lucky, maybe I<n>can get a selfie...
choice_data_list: Excuse me, but what's going on?

text_block_list.name: Trendy Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! Trainer, you're joking,right? Today's the day the famousUmastagrammer known only as"Curren" is transferring to ourschool!

text_block_list.name: Fangirl Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Wait, you really don't know?! We're<n>talking about the selfie
goddess with<n>over 3 million followers on<n>
Umastagram—that Curren!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems like this new transfer is<n>already well-loved by the
student<n>body. My curiosity piqued, I decide to<n>wait with
the crowd for her to arrive.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Soon enough, a limousine parks in<n>front of the school gate,
and a single<n>girl steps out.

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Aiiieeeeek! Curren!

text_block_list.name: Curren?
text_block_list.text:
Wow! ♪ What a welcome! Don't tell<n>me you were all waiting
for me?

text_block_list.name: Curren?
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you all are just the best!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
You just made me the world's<n>happiest Curren Chan! ♪
Heehee! ♪

text_block_list.name: Trendy Umamusume
text_block_list.text: No way! It's like Curren's got filters<n>on her—but in real life!

text_block_list.name: Trendy Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Omigosh—she's positively glowing!The Umastagram star, Curren, isreally in front of me right now!

text_block_list.name: Fangirl Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Um, do you mind if I get a picture with<n>you? I'm your
b-b-biggest fan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Not at all! Let's see... Right, this posewill make you extra cute!

text_block_list.name: Fangirl Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, I actually... got a pic with her.<n>Wow! Thank you so
much! I'll<n>treasure this forever!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Curren's happy when everyone's<n>happy! ♪ When you post
that pic,<n>don't forget to spread the love via<n>#CurrenChan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Everyone, there's still plenty of<n>pictures to be taken! ☆ Just
remember<n>sure to share the pics with all your<n>friends,
okay? ♪

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Okaaay! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What a presence... I find myself<n>staring at the impromptu
photoshoot,<n>lost for words, when suddenly... my<n>eyes
meet Curren's.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Y-you're—

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'm talking to you, silly!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: After all... you and I are meant to be!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
You're a trainer at this academy,<n>aren't you? I think... I was
destined to<n>find you here!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: It's decided—I've made up my mind!From today on... you'll be mytrainer! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Is... that a no? You know, I've been<n>waiting so long to see
you... Sniff,<n>sniff...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her sudden barrage of cuteness<n>nearly sways me, but I
return to my<n>senses. A contract between trainer<n>and
Umamusume isn't something to<n>be taken lightly.
choice_data_list: C-come over here for a sec!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Okaaay! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Leaving the school gate behind, I take<n>the time to explain to
Curren Chan<n>about trainers and how she shouldn't<n>pick
hers off of a first impression.
choice_data_list: You came here because you had a dream, right?
You came here because you had a dream, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...A dream, huh?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Well, of course I do! ♪ After all, I came<n>to this school...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...so I could hear everyone tell mehow cute I am! ♪ I bet that at theTracen Academy, I'll get waaay more followers!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It feels like someone just hit me overthe head with a sledgehammer.That's why she enrolled here?!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hear me out, okay? I want even more<n>people to love me,
and to do that—I<n>need you!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So, pleeease... Big Bro! Be my one<n>and only trainer! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So, pleeease... Big Sis! Be my one and<n>only trainer! ♪

text_block_list.name: Trendy Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
...Is that trainer actually trying to turn<n>down Curren? And
when she's<n>asking so earnestly, too...

text_block_list.name: Fangirl Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
If I were a trainer, I know I'd jump at<n>an opportunity like
this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can feel her fans staring daggers at<n>me right now... I try to
come up with a<n>good reason to turn her down, but<n>
somehow...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Then from today on, you're my<n>trainer! We're official! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Wait, what did I just agree to?! She<n>had me in the palm of
her hand! I'd<n>better keep my guard up around her<n>in the
future...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yay! ♪ Now we'll aaalways be<n>together! Isn't that great, Big
Bro? ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yay! ♪ Now we'll aaalways be<n>together! Isn't that great, Big
Sis? ♪

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Curren!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's a round of applause from the<n>nearby onlookers...
but not everyone<n>seems so keen to welcome the new<n>
arrival.

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text: ...What's the deal with that crowd?

text_block_list.name: Race-loving Umamusume
text_block_list.text: An Umastagrammer... I hope sheknows the rest of us are here torace.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I guess popularity is a double-edged<n>sword. But at this
academy, the only<n>way to prove the doubters wrong is<n>
with your race results.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Big Bro, are you worried about me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Big Sis, are you worried about me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thanks. But it'll be<n>okay—because I'm suuuper cute!
♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day, a physical evaluation is<n>held for Curren Chan.
Surrounded by<n>throngs of curious spectators, she<n>shows
off a variety of skills.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: 1,200 meters on dirt! A-at that speed!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our surroundings break out in<n>commotion. For a newbie, her
time<n>was exceptional! She might just have<n>a natural talent
for sprinting.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Big Brooo! Hey hey, how did I do? I<n>was reeeally cute out
there, right? ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Big Siiis! Hey hey, how did I do? I<n>was reeeally cute out
there, right? ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curren Chan... Why did she transfer<n>here, and what does
she want out of<n>racing? For now, I hit the follow<n>button on
her Umastagram profile.
